doc.field: Series IV. Advertising Promotion Department Records
Subseries IV.A. Special Events and Publicity Director Keith Morris Files
Series IV. Advertising Promotion Department Records
Subseries IV.A. Special Events and Publicity Director Keith Morris Files
Time Inc. Sports Illustrated Publishing and Business Records
Time Inc. Sports Illustrated Publishing and Business Records

Records include primarily audiovisual recordings of sporting events or contests and sports instructional films with some accompanying papers. The bulk of the records date from 1954 to 1967. Papers include form letters describing the films and response cards for the recipient to return regarding use of the film. The 1967 Sportsman of the Year contains a full collection of response cards. The files in box 4128 contain materials addressed to and from Terry Rice. Some of the audiovisual is part of the Sports Illustrated tape service based on the papers.
Unreformatted audiovisual material in the collection is not accessible.
